name: Sergeant Montgomery
affiliation: United States of AmericaUnited States Marine Corps
detailed_location: Anchorage Reclamation simulationU.S. Army field headquarters

topics.topic_text: Glad to see you made it in one piece.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I almost bought it out on the cliffs. Didn't know the Reds were so handy with a Sniper Rifle.

topics.topic_text: Let's cut the chatter... we've got some guns to destroy.
topics.response_text: Roger that.

topics.topic_text: What took you so damn long?
topics.response_text: Yeah, yeah. Don't break your arm patting yourself on the back, rookie. You took the easy way in.

topics.topic_text: Yep. Let's go.
topics.response_text: I got your six.

topics.topic_text: Hang on a second. Do you have any spare ammo?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I can spare a few rounds.

topics.topic_text: Hell yeah. See if you can keep up.
topics.response_text: No sweat. You're on point, rookie.

topics.topic_text: That's not necessary, Benji.
topics.response_text: Hell, saluting is the least I can do. Do you have any idea how many of our guys you saved by taking out those guns?

topics.topic_text: Enough! There has to be a way to halt this simulation. A passcode or something.
topics.response_text: Simulation? What the hell are you talking about? This is as real as it gets, G.I.

topics.topic_text: Thanks for the compliments, Sergeant.
topics.response_text: You deserve it, sir.

topics.topic_text: There's no time for chit chat, Sergeant.
topics.response_text: Yes, sir. Sorry, sir.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I guess I did kind of save the day.
topics.response_text: Oh ho! Listen to this guy!{sarcasm}

topics.topic_text: All in a day's work, Benji.
topics.response_text: All in a day's work he says. Yeah sure... every day I wake up and single-handedly infiltrate a Commie infested base on a suicide mission.{first line to self aloud/friendly sarcasm}

topics.topic_text: You save some, you lose others. Who cares as long as the job gets done?
topics.response_text: Who cares?

topics.topic_text: Don't worry, Benji. I'll make officers out of all of 'em.
topics.response_text: That's the spirit, buddy!

topics.topic_text: I never asked to be a role model. I just want to get through this.
topics.response_text: We all want to get through this. None of us asked to be here. We ALL left things behind when this shit started.

topics.topic_text: These soldiers aren't even real. This is all a sham.
topics.response_text: Wow, this place must really be getting to you.

topics.topic_text: I wouldn't even presume to argue with this simulation's A.I. subroutines.
topics.response_text: Subroutines? This is an Army gig, not the Navy. You sure those artillery guns going off didn't shake something loose up there?

topics.topic_text: Yeah, you're right. Sorry Benji!
topics.response_text: That's the spirit, buddy!

topics.topic_text: I suppose. Let's just get through this.
topics.response_text: Don't worry. We WILL get through this. I'll be there every step of the way to give you a hand.

topics.topic_text: Let's just drop the whole thing, okay?
topics.response_text: Fine. I guess we have a job to do, so let's get to it.

topics.topic_text: So, where do we stand with the Strike Team?
topics.response_text: Everyone's ready to go kick some Commie ass... sir.

topics.topic_text: Let's get the Strike Team moving, Sergeant.
topics.response_text: Yes sir. What are your orders?

topics.topic_text: Let's do this smooth and by the numbers. Follow my lead.
topics.response_text: Yes sir. What are your orders?

topics.topic_text: Radio to base that we need replacements.
topics.response_text: Can do. What unit should we request?

topics.topic_text: Have them send us an Infantryman.
topics.response_text: You got it, sir.

topics.topic_text: Have them send us a Grenadier.
topics.response_text: No problem, they should arrive shortly.

topics.topic_text: Have them send us a Missile Unit.
topics.response_text: Missile Unit on its way, sir.

topics.topic_text: Have them send us a Sniper.
topics.response_text: They'll be here momentarily, sir.

topics.topic_text: Have them send us a Mister Gutsy.
topics.response_text: Command will send it right out to us, sir.

topics.topic_text: Have them send us a Sentry Bot.
topics.response_text: It's on its way from the motor pool as we speak, sir.

topics.topic_text: Actually, cancel that order.
topics.response_text: No problem, sir.

topics.topic_text: Attack the enemy in the Mines.
topics.response_text: Yes sir. We'll attack the enemy at the Mining Town.

topics.topic_text: Wait for me outside the Chinese Ice Camp on the way to the Chimera Depot.
topics.response_text: Yes sir. On our way. We'll wait for you by the Ice Camp.

topics.topic_text: Now that the Ice Camp is out of the way, head up to the Chimera Depot.
topics.response_text: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Chimera Depot.

topics.topic_text: Now that we've dealt with the Mining Town, head to the Listening Post.
topics.response_text: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Listening Post.

topics.topic_text: Wait for me just outside the Mining Town on the way to the Listening Post.
topics.response_text: Yes sir.  On our way. We'll wait for you by the Mining Town.

topics.topic_text: I'll scope out the enemy at the Mining Town. Have the team wait here.
topics.response_text: Yes sir. We'll wait here. Let us know when you want us to attack the enemy at that location.

topics.topic_text: What's our current status on the targets?
topics.response_text: As soon as we take out the Pulse Field, I'll radio Chase to send in the shock troops.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: It's been an honor working with you. I don't think I've ever seen bravery like that on any battlefield.

conversation.response_text: Hell yeah! Take that you Red bastards!
That's two. Let's finish the job.
Ha ha! And they all come tumbling down! Yeah!
Woah... watch your step near those ledges. That is a HELL of a long fall.
Eyes on, we got company up ahead!
We're crossing that pipe? And here I thought I was the one with the death wish.
If I live just one more day without seeing another catwalk, I'll die a happy man.
Through this next structure is the entrance to the Artillery Base. I dunno what they got waiting for us, so keep a sharp watch.
Here's the entrance. Place is probably swarming with Reds.
Holy shit...
There! See 'em down there? That's their damn Chimera tanks. Don't worry, they're well out of range.
Hmm. Looks like the Commies are getting low on ammo for the big guns. Maybe we didn't even need to come up here.
Yeah, yeah.... so I was wrong. Let's keep moving.
That's the Front down there. These guns are pounding on our guys. Let's take 'em out!
Alrighty chief... we got three of those things to take down. You lead the way.
Plant that thing and let's go!
Let's blow this beast apart!
Last gun! Blow that thing off the map!
That was a hell of a nasty fall you took. When your chute bunched up like that I thought you were a goner. I hope the other guys made it...
I don't think their patrols spotted us coming in, so at least we still have the jump on 'em.
You still have your gear, so I'm gonna let you make the call. You can go in quiet or guns blazing.
We'll still meet at the rendezvous point inside as planned then we'll blow those artillery guns to hell.
Just watch yourself. The Reds up here don't take prisoners. Good luck!
This is Montgomery to Field H.Q. We are go for the attack! Send in the tin cans! I repeat, we are go for the attack!
Roger that.
Hey... hey! Wake up. Come on... snap out of it.

combat.response_text: Watch where you point that thing!

description:
Benjamin "Benji" Montgomery is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

Gunnery Sergeant Benjamin "Benji" Montgomery is a seasoned United States Marine Corps paratrooper and strike team leader with multiple tours of duty on the Anchorage front line. Known for his loyalty, competence, and friendly demeanor, he has become an integral part of General Chase's forces during the Anchorage Reclamation simulation.

Benjamin "Benji" Montgomery's Personality: Montgomery is a highly loyal and dedicated soldier with a strong sense of duty to his country and fellow Marines. He's competent, experienced, and has a friendly, personable side, often giving nicknames to those he considers allies. Despite the grim realities of war, he maintains a positive outlook and a sense of humor.

Benjamin "Benji" Montgomery's Backstory: Born and raised in pre-War America, Benjamin Montgomery enlisted in the United States Marine Corps shortly before the Great War. His military training and experience proved invaluable when the bombs fell, and he found himself serving in the Anchorage Reclamation simulation, fighting against the Red Chinese forces. Over the years, he rose through the ranks to become a Gunnery Sergeant and strike team leader, earning the respect of his peers and superiors alike. His last name is a nod to James Montgomery Flagg, the artist who created the iconic Uncle Sam recruitment poster during World War I, reflecting Montgomery's unwavering patriotism.
